definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
to support/to sustain/to erect/to raise/branch/division/to draw money/classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions

sentences.english: A occasional chance, He a guns second-hand resell to commons armed force army.
sentences.chinese: 一个偶然的机会，他把枪支转手倒卖给民间武装军队。

sentences.english: The reasons for keeping them away from everyone else get clearer.
sentences.chinese: 让枪支远离其他的所有人，其理由愈益清楚。

sentences.english: Political hooligans with tanks, missiles and guns!
sentences.chinese: 政治淌氓，坦克，导弹，枪支。

sentences.english: Illegal weapons are set aflame in Nairobi, Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 在内罗毕非法枪支被销毁，肯尼亚。

sentences.english: The policemen arrested the man for carrying a gun.
sentences.chinese: 警察以携带枪支罪逮捕了那个人。

sentences.english: Different types of guns could be identified in the shooting training using the system.
sentences.chinese: 而且该系统可以在射击训练时自动的识别不同的枪支。

sentences.english: More lawsuits challenging gun-control laws are now likely.
sentences.chinese: 现在越来越多的诉讼可能向枪支管制法律提出挑战。

sentences.english: The problem was guns were going to fuel the violence of the cartels in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 问题是，这些枪支强加速墨西哥贩毒集团的暴力行为。

sentences.english: We have got to do our part in reducing the flow of cash and guns south [to Mexico].
sentences.chinese: 我们必须尽我们的能力，减少金钱和枪支南流。
温克勒的新书名为《枪支斗争》。

sentences.english: An ex post facto law prohibits the use of guns by individuals against unarmed persons trespassing on their property.
sentences.chinese: 事后法阻止个人对赤手空拳的财产侵犯者使用枪支。

sentences.english: Illegal firearms are displayed before being destroyed in Panama City.
sentences.chinese: 巴拿马城，非法枪支在销毁之前被摆在地上。

sentences.english: The fire is aims at the goal with the guns to hit the target athletics project.
sentences.chinese: 射击是用枪支对准目标打靶的竞技项目。

sentences.english: Does your company have a policy regarding concealed weapons?
sentences.chinese: 你们公司有没有关于私藏枪支方面的政策？

sentences.english: Gun control has cleared the way for seven major genocides since 1915
sentences.chinese: 枪支管制清除障碍七大灭族自1915年。

sentences.english: In what bizarro world is gun control racist?
sentences.chinese: 枪支管制究竟带有什么样的种族主义色彩呢？

definition: a gun/guns in general/same as 槍支|枪支
rifle (loanword)/also written 來復槍|来复枪
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
